string-array.name: lion
string-array.item: Lion Bridge(Lavov most) is an important and busy intersection and bridge in the central parts of the city. The bridge is one of the landmarks of the city and a symbol of the metropolitan area Serdica. The implementation began in 1889-1891 on the project of VÃ¡clav Proshek. Four lions symbolize hanged by the Turks, Bulgarians.
Sofia, at the intersection of Maria Luiza and Slivnitsa boulevards. \nLocation: 42.705091, 23.323873 (Click to see on the map)
